description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take on the world's best stunt bike riders in this action packed 3D stunt simulator!  Master multiple levels across 3 surface types, and endo, wheelie and flip your way up the global leagues! Race against 7 ghost bikes - why race against a cheating AI player when you can to head-to-head with players of YOUR skill level?  Xbox Live Gold required for full functionality.
